    • complete

      public abstract void complete(DateAndTimeCombo completionDateAndTime)
      Setter method to mark task as complete. Subclasses must override method to ensure correct implementation within each task type's boundaries.
      Parameters:
      completionDateAndTime - Date and time task was completed.
      Precondition: 
      completionDateAndTime instanceof DateAndTimeCombo
      Postcondition:
      this.getCompletionDateAndTime() != null;
